trans-unit.source: Represents the exception state when code execution continues out of a <see langword="finally" /> block.
trans-unit.target: 表示程式碼從 <see langword="finally" /> 區塊繼續執行時的例外狀況狀態。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.JScript.ContinueOutOfFinally" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.JScript.ContinueOutOfFinally" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.JScript.ContinueOutOfFinally" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.JScript.ContinueOutOfFinally" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.JScript.ContinueOutOfFinally" /> class, using the specified target.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的目標，初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.JScript.ContinueOutOfFinally" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.JScript.ContinueOutOfFinally" /> class, using the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.JScript.ContinueOutOfFinally" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.JScript.ContinueOutOfFinally" /> class, using the specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息和造成這個例外狀況原因的內部例外參考，初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.JScript.ContinueOutOfFinally" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The serialized object data about the exception that is being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 有關擲回之例外狀況的序列化物件資料。

trans-unit.source: Contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Stores information about the exception in the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 將例外狀況的相關資訊儲存在 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The stored information includes the <see cref="F:Microsoft.JScript.ContinueOutOfFinally.target" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 儲存的資訊包含 <see cref="F:Microsoft.JScript.ContinueOutOfFinally.target" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Stores the target of the exception.
